entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Rimouski
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:56 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
